external_games.name: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Pursue the Mystery of the Sexy Planet

name: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Pursue the Mystery of the Sexy Planet
storyline: At the edge of the universe lies a group of hot spring planets, and it is said that treasures is hidden somewhere out there. However, each planet is home to cunning monsters and sexy boss enemies, and it is up to the player defeat them and find the treasure.
summary: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Pursue the Mystery of the Sexy Planet was the successor title to Puchitto Rock Shooter browser game.
